nodes.text: Shimmer was a planet located in the Rayter sector.
Covered with gigantic glaciers, the planet was located in the Outer Rim's Rayter sector.

During the Galactic Civil War, it was the site of a Rebel Alliance medium-security work camp. One of the prisoners was Darryn Edalm, the former Imperial governor of Karra, who had been captured during Operation 265-A.
